directions: Bring milk and salt just to a boil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Stir in farina gradually; return to boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to low; simmer until cereal thickens, about 2 1/2 minutes.
Remove cereal from heat; cool for 3 minutes. Pour cereal into 2 bowls; stir 1 tablespoon peanut butter chips into each bowl.
ingredients: 1/3 cup dry farina cereal (such as Cream of Wheat®)
2 tablespoons peanut butter chips (such as Reese's®), divided
title: Sweet Tooth Farina with Peanut Butter Chips
